attributes.review: This app definitely has a virus my whole phone rebooted as soon as I opened the app. Needs to be taken off. Also it wanted my location, talk about creepy.

attributes.review: No one should have to go through the same experience I went through with this app. Please delete it already:(

attributes.review: Would give this app 0 stars if I could. As soon as I opened it up all I could hear was PIG NOISES AND SMELLED CHEETOS. Scarred me for life, I can’t get the image out of my head. If that wasn’t horrible enough, trumps nudes were on the screen. Absolutely disgusting. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I wish this platform never existed. The managing’s terrible and I can barely do anything in here without it wasting all of my storage! What’s worse is that this is the Presidents app so it should be top tier but it’s really trash. DO BETTER

attributes.review: This app is so bad. It’s not even good. For people who hate trump. Do not download this it is the worst! This is such a horrible app. People could be watching you from this app so don’t download it for your safety and mine :)
